page.title: 12GAMES
page.content: SCHOOL PLAYGROUNDS IN OUR AREA ARE HIVES OF ACTIVITY AT BREAK TIMES DURING THE DAY.PLAYGROUND GAMES ARE A LONG ESTABLISHED TRADITION IN ENGLAND AND MANY GAMES HAVE BEEN HANDED DOWN FROM GENERATION TO GENERATION.THE GAMES VARY FROM THOSE NOT REQUIRING ANY EQUIPMENT (E.G. CHANTING GAMES) TO THOSE WITH COMPLEX RULES (E.G. FOOTBALL).SOME OF THE GAMES,LIKE CONKERS IN AUTUMN AND SKIPPING AND ROUNDERS IN SUMMER,ARE SEASONAL. SIMPLE GAMES SUCH AS CIRCLE AND CHANTING GAMES ARE POPULAR WITH YOUNGER CHILDREN AND GIRLS WHILST MORE BOISTEROUS GAMES LIKE ROUNDERS AND FOOTBALL ARE ENJOYED BY THE OLDER CHILDREN.
